channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Code Coverage API Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Code Coverage API Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21677|2024-08-03T18:23:27.501Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20code%20coverage%20api%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Code Coverage API Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier does not apply Jenkins JEP-200 deserialization protection to Java objects it deserializes from disk, resulting in a remote code execution vulnerability.
